official_title: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to provide for the establishment of a National Environmental Education Center.

summary.text: Environmental Education Act of 1993 - Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to direct the Secretary of Education to make grants, through a national competition, to establish and support a National Environmental Education Center.

titles.title: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to provide for the establishment of a National Environmental Education Center.
